mapper.update: Update projects set project_title=#{projectTitle}, description=#{description}, abilities=#{abilities}, benefits= #{benefits}, views=#{views}, status=#{status} where projects_id= 1
mapper.select: SELECT projects_id as projectsId, project_title as projectTitle, description as description, abilities as abilities, benefits as benefits, status as status, create_date as createDate FROM projects WHERE projects_id =#{projectsId}
SELECT projects_id as projectsId, project_title as projectTitle, description as description, abilities as abilities, benefits as benefits, status as status, create_date as createDate FROM projects
